structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.catch_line: Duties of air pollution control officer -- Powers as peace officer.

text.section: In enforcing the provisions of this chapter and the orders, regulations, rules, variances, and standards of the air pollution control board and the hearing board, the air pollution control officer, his deputies and his assistants are peace officers.

law.history: Created 1952 Ky. Acts ch. 53, secs. 32 and 33, effective March 14, 1952.
